#summary Installation
#labels Featured

= Introduction =

cppcheclipse is an Eclipse Plugin, which can be installed over the update mechanism, provided by Eclipse.

= Requirements =
Eclipse 3.4/3.5 with CDT

= Details =

  # Click on Help->Install New Software...
  # Add the new Update Site http://cppcheclipse.googlecode.com/svn/update/
  # From this Update Site you can download and install cppcheclipse
